❤️ Save money and help charities of your choice! 

😎 How It Works
Join Many Hands and use our discounts, specials, and sales. We receive a commission based on your link clicks and purchases. 80% of the commission goes to your selected charities.

💾  Save stores
Save the stores you frequent, and see the number of current discounts and sales available. Easily search for additional stores.

🪄 Choose three
Select three charities to allocate your affiliate commission money. Change them anytime!

💽 Your data 
We don't use, sell, or distribute any of your data. The only element we look at is the URL to see if it corresponds with discounts in our database. 

❤️ JOIN US AND BE ONE OF OUR MANY HANDS 🤝!
